<title>Home</title>
<h1>Zettelstore</h1>
To get an initial impression, take a look at the <a href="/manual/">manual</a>.
It is a live example of the zettelstore software, running in read-only mode.

You can <a href="./download.wiki">download</a> executables of the zettelstore
software. They are the same build as in the live example.

The source code of the software is available
<a href="../../../dir?ci=trunk">here</a> on this site.
If you want do download the source code as a Tarball or a ZIP file, you must
<a href="../../../login">login</a> as user &quot;anonymous&quot;.
You will find the appropriate links for each
<a href="../../../info?name=trunk">Check-in</a>.

The source code is also mirrored on
<a href="https://github.com/zettelstore/zettelstore">GitHub</a>.
The <a href="https://github.com/zettelstore/zettelstore-manual">manual</a>
is currently stored on GitHub too, but this will change in the future when the
manual is part of the software.

Both the source code and the manual is licensed under the
<a href="../../../file?name=LICENSE.txt&ci=trunk">European Union Public License 1.2 (or later)</a>.

<a href="https://twitter.com/zettelstore">Stay tuned</a>&hellip;
